datum: Mary hath been taken to heaven; * the Angels rejoice; they praise and bless the Lord.
The Virgin Mary * hath been taken into the chamber on high, where the King of kings sitteth on a throne amid the stars.
In the scent * of thy perfumes we run after thee; other virgins love thee heartily.
Blessed of the Lord art thou, daughter, * for by thee we have been given to eat of the fruit of Life.
Fair * and comely art thou, O daughter of Jerusalem, terrible as a fenced camp set in battle array.
